00027 template<int M>
00028 BundleAdjuster<M>::BundleAdjuster(const MeasurementMatrix<M> &E,
00029                                   MotionMatrix<M> &P) :
00030   measurement(E),
00031   motion(P)
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00044 template<int M>
00045 int BundleAdjuster<M>::operator()(const Eigen::VectorXd &params, 
00046                          Eigen::VectorXd &errs) {
00047 
00048   params_to_matrices(params);
00049   motion.reprojection_err(measurement, errs);
00050   // --- add error for scale
00051   errs(errs.size()-1) = motion.col(3).norm() - M;
00052 
00053   //std::cout << "params are = " << std::endl;
00054   //std::cout << params << std::endl;
00055   //std::cout << "Size error = " << errs(errs.size()-1) << std::endl;
00056   //std::cout << "Reprojection error = " << std::endl;
00057   //std::cout << errs << std::endl;
00058   std::cout << "Err = " << errs.norm()/(2.0*M*measurement.cols()*0.92) << std::endl;
00059   return(0);
00060 }

00075 template<int M>
00076 Eigen::AngleAxisd BundleAdjuster<M>::rotation_to_angleaxis(constBlock3 rot) {
00077   double cosphi = cos(rot(2));
00078   return(Eigen::AngleAxisd(rot(0),
00079           Eigen::Vector3d(cos(rot(1))*cosphi,
00080                           sin(rot(1))*cosphi,
00081                           sin(rot(2)))));
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00097 template<int M>
00098 Eigen::Vector3d BundleAdjuster<M>::angleaxis_to_rotation(const Eigen::AngleAxisd &A){
00099   return(Eigen::Vector3d(A.angle(), 
00100                          std::atan(A.axis()(1)/A.axis()(0)),
00101                          std::atan(A.axis()(2)/sqrt(A.axis()(0)*A.axis()(0) + 
00102                                                     A.axis()(1)*A.axis()(1)))
00103                          )
00104          );
00105 }

00111 template<int M>
00112 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::Block2
00113 BundleAdjuster<M>::principal_pt(int v, Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00114   if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) 
00115     throw("Tried to vary principal point of a fixed intrinsic in BundleAdjuster");
00116   return(params.middleRows<2>(6*(M-1) + 3*(v-fixedIntrinsics.size())));
00117 }
00118 
00119 template<int M>
00120 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::constBlock2
00121 BundleAdjuster<M>::principal_pt(int v, const Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00122   if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) 
00123     throw("Tried to read principal point of a fixed intrinsic in BundleAdjuster");
00124   return(params.middleRows<2>(6*(M-1) + 3*(v-fixedIntrinsics.size())));
00125 }

00131 template<int M>
00132 inline double &
00133 BundleAdjuster<M>::focal_len(int v, Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00134   if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) 
00135     throw("Tried to vary focal length of a fixed intrinsic in BundleAdjuster");
00136   return(params(6*(M-1) + 3*(v-fixedIntrinsics.size()) + 2));
00137 }
00138 template<int M>
00139 inline const double &
00140 BundleAdjuster<M>::focal_len(int v, const Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00141   if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) 
00142     throw("Tried to read focal length of a fixed intrinsic in BundleAdjuster");
00143   return(params(6*(M-1) + 3*(v-fixedIntrinsics.size()) + 2));
00144 }

00150 template<int M>
00151 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::Block3
00152 BundleAdjuster<M>::translation(int v, Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00153   return(params.middleRows<3>(6*(v-1)));
00154 }

00156 template<int M>
00157 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::constBlock3 
00158 BundleAdjuster<M>::translation(int v, const Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00159   return(params.middleRows<3>(6*(v-1)));
00160 }

00166 template<int M>
00167 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::Block3
00168 BundleAdjuster<M>::rotation(int v, Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00169   return(params.middleRows<3>(6*(v-1)+3));
00170 }
00171 
00172 template<int M>
00173 inline typename BundleAdjuster<M>::constBlock3
00174 BundleAdjuster<M>::rotation(int v, const Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00175   return(params.middleRows<3>(6*(v-1)+3));
00176 }

00178 
00180 // copies the parameters in 'params' to the motion matrix
00182 template<int M>
00183 void BundleAdjuster<M>::params_to_matrices(const Eigen::VectorXd &params) {
00184   int v;
00185 
00186   for(v = 0; v < M; ++v) {
00187     if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) {
00188       motion.M(v) = fixedIntrinsics[v].matrix();
00189     } else {
00190       motion.M(v) = (Eigen::Translation2d(principal_pt(v,params)) *
00191                     Eigen::Scaling(focal_len(v,params))).matrix();
00192     }
00193     if(v > 0) {
00194       motion.M(v) *= rotation_to_angleaxis(rotation(v,params)).toRotationMatrix();
00195       motion.T(v) = translation(v,params);
00196     }
00197   }
00198   motion.T(0).setZero();
00199 }
00200 
00201 
00206 template<int M>
00207 void BundleAdjuster<M>::matrices_to_params() {
00208   int                   v;
00209   Eigen::Affine2d       K; // intrinsics
00210   Eigen::AngleAxisd     R; // camera rotation
00211   double                translation_norm;
00212   double                Mscale;
00213 
00214   translation_norm = 0.0;
00215   for(v = 0; v<M; ++v) {
00216     Mscale = motion.KR_decompose(v,K,R);
00217     if(v < fixedIntrinsics.size()) {
00218       fixedIntrinsics[v] = K;
00219     } else {
00220       principal_pt(v, variableParams) = K.translation();
00221       focal_len(v, variableParams)    = (K(0,0) + K(1,1))*0.5;
00222     }
00223     if(v > 0) {
00224       rotation(v, variableParams)    = angleaxis_to_rotation(R);
00225       translation(v, variableParams) = motion.T(v) / Mscale;
00226       translation_norm += translation(v, variableParams).squaredNorm();
00227     }
00228   }
00229 
00230   // --- normalise scale of translations
00231   translation_norm = sqrt(translation_norm);
00232   for(v = 1; v<M; ++v) {
00233     // translation(v, variableParams) -= motion.T(0);
00234     translation(v, variableParams) *= M/translation_norm;
00235   }
00236 }

00258 template<int M>
00259 int BundleAdjuster<M>::levmar_solve(int nFixedIntrinsics) {
00260   int info;
00261   int nPixels;
00262   int i,j;
00263 
00264   // --- count number of un-occluded pixels
00265   nPixels = 0;
00266   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00267     for(j = 0; j<measurement.cols(); ++j) {
00268       if(!measurement.pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00269         ++nPixels;
00270       }
00271     }
00272   }
00273   
00274   // --- setup variables for solve
00275   fixedIntrinsics.resize(nFixedIntrinsics);
00276   variableParams.resize(6*(M-1) + 3*(M-nFixedIntrinsics));
00277   matrices_to_params();
00278 
00279   Eigen::VectorXd tmperr;
00280   params_to_matrices(variableParams);
00281   motion.reprojection_err(measurement, tmperr);
00282   std::cout << "Parameterised reprojection err = " << std::endl;
00283   std::cout << tmperr.norm()/(2.0*nPixels) << std::endl;
00284 
00285   // --- do solve
00286   std::cout << "Starting solve with params = " << std::endl;
00287   std::cout << variableParams << std::endl;
00288   info = levmar_solve(variableParams, 2*nPixels + 1);
00289   params_to_matrices(variableParams);
00290   std::cout << "Finished levmar with status = " << info << std::endl;
00291 
00292   motion.reprojection_err(measurement, tmperr);
00293   std::cout << "Final reprojection err = " << std::endl;
00294   std::cout << tmperr.norm()/(2.0*nPixels) << std::endl;
00295 
00296   return(info);
00297 }
